welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Buford, a charming city known for its scenic views and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our unique culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning landscapes. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Buford!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gwinnett County Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for executive and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Gilmer Memorial Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Winder Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Winder Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and corporate flights at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Canton Cherokee County Regional Airport is a small, modern building with convenient amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.
